description: Why Choose Eduncle All New Mobile App?    Features & their benefits:   For Students-    Learn with Eduncles Free Study Kit (Worth Rs 500/-) with Premium Study Plan, Previous Year Papers, Updated Syllabus and Model Solved Test.    Regular Guidance, Tips and Tricks from exam Experts & Toppers which will help you to stay motivated and boost your preparation for good results.   Search from the library of 10,000+ Questions or Ask a new query in the form of text, image or voice. Your doubts will be answered by fellow Students and Teachers who are part of the Eduncle Community.    Stay updated with Regular Exam Notifications like dates, admission forms, job openings, etc. to help you plan your preparation in a way so you can avoid missing out on any opportunity.   Upgrade to Premium & Study with Eduncles Top-Quality Courses and Test Series along with Personalized Mentorship & Quick Doubt Solution by Exam Experts.    For Teachers-    Earn Reward Points by Answering the questions asked by students & encash them or receive exclusive awards.   Boost your recognition in the Community of thousands of students & teachers.     Why Students Trust Eduncle   More than 48 million students have visited Eduncle.com  2.6 million students have benefited from personalised learning  Over 23,500 students are part of Eduncle.com for their test preparation  More than 75% of students recommend Eduncle.com for its practice questions & test series  More than 91% of students find Eduncles doubt solution & mentoring services outstanding  310+ top quality online courses launched across 3 major exams    Highlights of Eduncles & Students Victory   More than 2610+ Eduncle students cracked their exams using Eduncle Courses  1400+ students qualified UGC NET with 112 students scoring 99+ percentile  47.70% of Eduncle students got selected in IIT JAM  38.30% of selected Eduncle students are under AIR 100 in CSIR-NET  Eduncle students reached their goal with Top AIRs like 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9, 10, etc in various exams.    Awards and Recognitions  10 Most Promising Edtech Companies to Watch (2020) First runner up at National Digital Library of India, GES 2018 by IIT Kharagpur in the field of online education and delivering excellence Top 10 Promising Digital Learning Portals (2018) Top 10 Booming Ed-Tech Start-ups (2018)
